Name: Astralis
About the game: Priviet to Astralis ! In this short game, you play as Lieutenant Alekse√Ø Ivanov, a soldier awaken from his cryo-sleep. You are facing a terrible threat happening in the soviet spaceship 'Astralis' lost in an unkown part of the universe. In this FPS horror sci-fi, you can rely on 5 unique weapons to confront your ennemies. You can also upgrade each weapon with 2 mods to gain unique effects. As an enhanced soldier, you have the ability to control time but in the spaceship corridors you may found 2 other powers as much as powerful ! Will you unveil the mysteries of the soviet mission ? What final choice will you make ? it's up to you !
